title: President instructs to fulfil nurses’ demands
content: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has instructed that the demands made by the Nurses’ Trade Union be met, taking into consideration the financial situation of the country and without affecting the public service.“Health services, including medical and the nursing staff are highly valued.” “Take steps to provide the approved nurses’ demands while understanding the financial situation in the country and without affecting the public service,” the President has said.
